page.title: 14A TYPICAL LALEHAM SCHOOLDAY
page.content: At 8.50 the bell goes and we go into school from the playground.We always have something to do as our teacher takes the register.After that we have a school assembly and that usually lasts until 9.30.We then return to our classroom,collect our books and go to French.At 10.10 we go back to our own classroom for English.At 10.40 we have our first break_hooray!_then at 10.55 it's back to work and maths.12.00 soon comes and we go to lunch either school diners or sandwiches.We play on the playground or the field,if it's nice,until 01.10 when we go in for our interesting project period.Our last break is from 02.15_02.30 then it's time for everyones'favourite_{GAMES} .At 03.30 the final bell goes and it is time to go home.
